title: Kelly Brook showcases her peachy posterior in a pair of figure-hugging jeans for Heart radio duties
text:
She hosts a daily drive time radio show with co-presenter Jason King on Heart.

And Kelly Brook cut a stylish figure as she headed to Heart radio for her hosting duties on Friday.

The model, 39, showcased her peachy posterior and famous curves in a pair of figure-hugging denim jeans.

Stylish: Kelly Brook cut a stylish figure as she headed to Heart radio for her hosting duties on Friday

She teamed the item of clothing with a cosy white polo neck jumper and a chic tartan bomber jacket.

Adding some finishing touches, Kelly opted for a pair of white heeled ankle boots and a black handbag with a gold chain.

The model turned presenter styled her brunette locks into a sleek blow-dried hairdo, she added a slick of make-up to enhance her stunning features.

Kelly's appearance comes after the actress gave an insightful interview about her past dating life to MailOnline.

Peachy: The model, 39, showcased her peachy posterior and famous curves in a pair of figure-hugging denim jeans

Finishing touches: Adding some finishing touches, Kelly opted for a pair of white heeled ankle boots and a black handbag with a gold chain

Kelly, who is happily loved-up with beau Jeremy Parisi, said: 'I like to think I'm a loving and open person. But I tended to trust everybody. As I moved into my 30s, I came to realise that was a mistake.

'I'm particularly thinking of members of the opposite sex. I had a series of boyfriends who professed their undying love then cheated on me.'

She added: 'I was guilty of giving people the benefit of the doubt, so I wasn't doing enough to protect my own interests. I hope I've always been kind, but you can forget to be kind to yourself.

Glamorous: The model turned presenter styled her brunette locks into a sleek blow-dried hairdo, she added a slick of make-up to enhance her stunning features

'Being too nice can rebound on you. Certainly, jealousy can play its part. I think people sometimes want what you've got.'

The honey-blonde bombshell has a slew of famous exes, including Jason Statham, Billy Zane and rugby player Danny Cipriani - who she dumped when she found messages on his phone from other women.

Kelly has been dating Jeremy, 34, since April 2015 when she reached out to him on social media, revealing she 'slipped into his DMs' on Instagram before they met in person.
